primary.$description: The default color for borders on any element. It uses to emphasize an element that is placed on a page directly, but not on a surface card.

secondary.$description: This border is used to differentiate a section or a group or a card that is placed on top of another big card, usually used on groups that are placed on top of a surface background, which is a white background.

tertiary.$description: This border is a color that's rarely used, but it's used to make a less emphasized section border in order to allow it to differentiate this section.

hover.$description: The hover color for borders on any element.

active.$description: The active color for borders on any active element or selected.

disabled.$description: The disabled color for borders on any element.

brand.$description: Use for borders paired with brand colors.

brand-hover.$description: Use if the initial item is using the brand color border, but I am hovering on it and this is an interactive element.

brand-active.$description: Use if the initial item is using the brand color, and this item is currently in an active state.

success-hover.$description: Use for borders communicating success but while hover on it if the element is interactive.

success-active.$description: Use for borders communicating success but while the element is interactive and active.

critical.$description: Use for borders communicating critical information.

critical-hover.$description: Use for borders communicating critical but while hover on it if the element is interactive.

critical-active.$description: Use for borders communicating critical but while the element is interactive and active.

magic.$description: Use for borders suggested by magic AI.

magic-hover.$description: Use for borders communicating AI but while hover on it if the element is interactive.

magic-active.$description: Use for borders communicating AI but while the element is interactive and active.

light.$description: The default background color of the application or page

primary.$description: The background color of contained elements with a smaller surface area, like a button or badge.

hover.$description: The hover state color of contained elements with a smaller surface area.

active.$description: The active state (on press) color of contained elements with a smaller surface area.

disabled.$description: The disabled state color of contained elements with a smaller surface area.

brand.$description: The background color of main actions, like primary buttons.

brand-hover.$description: The hover state color of main actions, like primary buttons.

brand-active.$description: The active state (on press) color of main actions, like primary buttons.

brand-secondary.$description: The background color of brand elements with a secondary level of prominence, like outlined buttons or subtle badges.

brand-secondary-hover.$description: The hover state color of brand elements with a secondary level of prominence.

brand-secondary-active.$description: The active state (on press) color of brand elements with a secondary level of prominence.

warning.$description: Use for backgrounds communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or a button.

warning-hover.$description: The hover state color for communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area.

warning-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area.

warning-secondary.$description: Use for backgrounds communicating warning on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

warning-secondary-hover.$description: The hover state color for warning elements with a secondary level of prominence.

warning-secondary-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for warning elements with a secondary level of prominence.

magic.$description: The background color of elements suggested by magic AI, like a badge or a button.

magic-hover.$description: The hover state color of elements suggested by magic AI.

magic-active.$description: The active state (on press) color of elements suggested by magic AI.

magic-secondary.$description: The background color of elements suggested by magic AI, with a secondary level of prominence.

magic-secondary-hover.$description: The hover state color of AI-suggested elements with a secondary level of prominence.

magic-secondary-active.$description: The active state (on press) color of AI-suggested elements with a secondary level of prominence.

success.$description: Use for backgrounds communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or a button.

success-hover.$description: The hover state color for communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area.

success-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area.

success-secondary.$description: Use for backgrounds communicating success on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

success-secondary-hover.$description: The hover state color for success elements with a secondary level of prominence.

success-secondary-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for success elements with a secondary level of prominence.

critical.$description: Use for backgrounds communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area, like a badge or a button.

critical-hover.$description: The hover state color for communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area.

critical-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area.

critical-secondary.$description: Use for backgrounds communicating critical information on elements with a smaller surface area, with a secondary level of prominence.

critical-secondary-hover.$description: The hover state color for critical elements with a secondary level of prominence.

critical-secondary-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for critical elements with a secondary level of prominence.

primary.$description: The background color for elements with the highest level of prominence, like a card or panel.

hover.$description: The hover state color for elements with the highest level of prominence.

active.$description: The active state (on press) color for elements with the highest level of prominence.

secondary.$description: The background color for elements with a secondary level of prominence, like nested cards or sections.

secondary-hover.$description: The hover state color for elements with a secondary level of prominence.

secondary-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for elements with a secondary level of prominence.

disabled.$description: The disabled state color for surface elements.

light-20.$description: A 20% opacity light overlay. Use for subtle highlights or shine effects on dark surfaces.

dark-12.$description: A 12% opacity dark overlay. Use for subtle shadows or hover states on light backgrounds.

dark-60.$description: A 60% opacity dark overlay. Use for modal backdrops or to dim background content.

dark-70.$description: A 70% opacity dark overlay. Use for drawer backdrops or stronger content dimming.

dark-85.$description: An 85% opacity dark overlay. Use for heavy backdrops or to strongly emphasize focused content.

brand-12.$description: A 12% opacity brand-colored overlay. Use for subtle brand emphasis on interactive states.

primary.$description: The default text color for body text and headings.

secondary.$description: Use for text with a secondary level of prominence, like descriptions or helper text.

disabled.$description: Use for text in a disabled state.

on-fill.$description: Use for text on filled backgrounds, like text on primary buttons.

on-fill-hover.$description: The hover state color for text on filled backgrounds.

on-fill-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for text on filled backgrounds.

on-fill-disabled.$description: The disabled state color for text on filled backgrounds.

link-hover.$description: The hover state color for text links.

link-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for text links.

magic.$description: Use for text suggested by magic AI.

magic-hover.$description: The hover state color for text suggested by magic AI.

magic-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for text suggested by magic AI.

magic-secondary.$description: Use for text suggested by magic AI with a secondary level of prominence.

success-hover.$description: The hover state color for text communicating success.

success-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for text communicating success.

success-secondary.$description: Use for text communicating success with a secondary level of prominence.

critical.$description: Use for text communicating critical information.

critical-hover.$description: The hover state color for text communicating critical information.

critical-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for text communicating critical information.

critical-secondary.$description: Use for text communicating critical information with a secondary level of prominence.

warning-secondary.$description: Use for text communicating warning with a secondary level of prominence.

secondary.$description: Use for icons with a secondary level of prominence.

disabled.$description: The disabled state color for icons.

on-fill.$description: Use for icons on filled backgrounds, like icons on primary buttons.

on-fill-hover.$description: The hover state color for icons on filled backgrounds.

on-fill-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for icons on filled backgrounds.

on-fill-disabled.$description: The disabled state color for icons on filled backgrounds.

link.$description: Use for icons in link elements or clickable icon buttons.

link-hover.$description: The hover state color for icons in link elements.

link-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for icons in link elements.

success-hover.$description: The hover state color for icons communicating success.

success-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for icons communicating success.

warning-dark.$description: Use for warning icons on light backgrounds that need stronger contrast.

critical.$description: Use for icons communicating critical information.

critical-hover.$description: The hover state color for icons communicating critical information.

critical-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for icons communicating critical information.

magic.$description: Use for icons suggested by magic AI.

magic-hover.$description: The hover state color for icons suggested by magic AI.

magic-active.$description: The active state (on press) color for icons suggested by magic AI.
